    • Uses of AbstractWeapon in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller

      Methods in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller that return AbstractWeapon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractWeapon ControllerFactory.createWeaponController(WeaponCard weaponCard)
      Creates the controller for a specific weapon The controller will be set up with all the effects and their targets, so it's ready to use.
      AbstractWeapon StandardControllerFactory.createWeaponController(WeaponCard weaponCard)
      Creates the controller for a specific weapon The controller will be set up with all the effects and their targets, so it's ready to use.
      Methods in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller with parameters of type AbstractWeapon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractEffect ControllerFactory.createEffectController(AbstractWeapon weapon, org.json.JSONObject config)
      Creates the controller for a specific weapon effect The controller will be set up with all the needed targets, so it's ready to use.
      AbstractEffect StandardControllerFactory.createEffectController(AbstractWeapon weapon, org.json.JSONObject config)
      Creates the controller for a specific weapon effect The controller will be set up with all the needed targets, so it's ready to use.
      AbstractTarget ControllerFactory.createTargetController(AbstractWeapon weapon, org.json.JSONObject config)
      Creates the controller for a specific weapon target The required configuration fields are id and type, the other ones will receive default values if not specified in the JSON.
      AbstractTarget StandardControllerFactory.createTargetController(AbstractWeapon weapon, org.json.JSONObject config)
      Creates the controller for a specific weapon target The required configuration fields are id and targetMode, the other ones will receive default values if not specified in the JSON.

    • Uses of AbstractWeapon in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.weapons

      Subclasses of AbstractWeapon in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.weapons 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlternativeModesWeapon
      Controller for a weapon where the player can use only one between alternative effects (a.k.a. modes) All the effects are treated as mandatory, the player can't choose to execute no effect.
      class  OptionalEffectsWeapon
      Controller for a weapon with one mandatory effect and optional effects.
